attributes.action: Use the selling price rather than the P11D value to determine car tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No purchaser of a vehicle in the UK pays the P11D value for a vehicle.

Why is it then that the government uses this inflated value to increase our company car tax.

I believe this is unfair and discriminates against the company car driver.

A more reasonable value should be based on the actual purchase price of the vehicle not its inflated P11D value.

Thank you

Mark Curtlin
